CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 2, 1952, pg. 25, reads:" Promotion Exercises - These Letsche School students were promoted from the 8-A class to Fifth High School on Monday. Among members of the class are Harriet Austin, William Boyd, Laverne Brewer, Marion Bryant, Nelson Bryant, James Chapman, Rita Clark, Rodney Clayton, Minnie Davenport, Eleanor Davis, Leroy Dunning, Arthur Florence, Patricia Frazier, Richard Gaither, Edward Gordon, Doris Hall, Dorothy Hammond, Joyce Hammond, Shirley Houston, Joe Ingram, Robert Lineberger, Stewart Miller, Wayne Morris, John Moses, Mary Louise Paige, Samuel Parker, Alfred Skinner, Carl Smith, Robert Taylor, Rosie Lee Thomas, Leroy Wagner, Douglas Winfrey, Thoman Winston, Donald Williams and Barbara Wright."
TitMainTitle: Students from Letsche School on stage, including Harriet Austin, William Boyd, Laverne Brewer, Marion Bryant, Nelson Bryant, James Chapman, Rita Clark, Rodney Clayton, Minnie Davenport, Eleanor Davis, Leroy Dunning, Arthur Florence, Patricia Frazier, Richard Gaither, Edward Gordon, Doris Hall, Dorothy Hammond, Joyce Hammond, Shirley Houston, Joe Ingram, Robert Lineberger, Stewart Miller, Wayne Morris, John Moses, Mary Louise Paige, Samuel Parker, Alfred Skinner, Carl Smith, Robert Taylor, Rosie Lee Thomas, Leroy Wagner, Douglas Winfrey, Thoman Winston, Donald Williams and Barbara Wright
